sed -i -e "s@### localPathListAllowed=@localPathListAllowed=&OSG_SRMlocalPathListAllowed;@" /etc/bestman2/conf/bestman2.rc sed -i -e "s@### supportedProtocolList=@supportedProtocolList=&OSG_SRMsupportedProtocolList;@" /etc/bestman2/conf/bestman2.rc sed -i -e "s@### pluginLib=/usr/share@#ed pluginLib=/usr/share@" /etc/bestman2/conf/bestman2.rc sed -i -e "s@### protocolSelectionPolicy=PROTOCOL_POLICY@#ed protocolSelectionPolicy=class=plugin.RoundRobinWithPath\&jarFile=RRWP.jar\&name=gsiftp\&param=/usr/share/java/bestman2/plugin/gsiftp.servers.txt@" /etc/bestman2/conf/bestman2.rc sed -i -e "s@### GUMSProtocol=XACML@GUMSProtocol=XACML@" /etc/bestman2/conf/bestman2.rc sed -i -e "s@### GUMSserviceURL=@GUMSserviceURL=https://&OSG_GumsServer;:8443/gums/services/GUMSXACMLAuthorizationServicePort@" /etc/bestman2/conf/bestman2.rc
sed -i -e "s/# GLOBUS_TCP_PORT_RANGE=/GLOBUS_TCP_PORT_RANGE=&OSG_GlobusTcpPortRange;/" /etc/sysconfig/bestman2 sed -i -e "s/# GLOBUS_TCP_SOURCE_RANGE=/GLOBUS_TCP_SOURCE_RANGE=&OSG_GlobusTcpSourceRange;/" /etc/sysconfig/bestman2 sed -i -e "s@# BESTMAN_PLUGIN=@#ed BESTMAN_PLUGIN=/usr/share/java/bestman2/plugin/RRWP.jar@" /etc/sysconfig/bestman2

sed -i -e "s/Defaults requiretty/#Defaults requiretty/" /etc/sudoers
Cmnd_Alias SRM_CMD = /bin/rm, /bin/mkdir, /bin/rmdir, /bin/mv, /bin/cp, /bin/ls Runas_Alias SRM_USR = ALL, !root bestman ALL=(SRM_USR) NOPASSWD: SRM_CMD
chmod 440 /etc/sudoers
sed -i -e "s#yourgums.yourdomain#&OSG_GumsServer;#" /etc/lcmaps.db
sed -i -e "s@# globus_mapping@globus_mapping@" /etc/grid-security/gsi-authz.conf
#!/bin/sh
THISHOST=`hostname` THISEXEC=$0 DIRNAME=`dirname $THISEXEC` SESERVER="&OSG_SEServer;" CERTSDIR="&OSG_StoredCertsDir;/&hostname;"
#temporary solution (or permanent?) while figuring out #how to import certs at installation step in a secure way if [ ! -f $DIRNAME/hostcert.pem ]; then cp -p $CERTSDIR/hostcert.pem $DIRNAME/. fi if [ ! -f $DIRNAME/hostkey.pem ]; then cp -p $CERTSDIR/hostkey.pem $DIRNAME/. fi
if [ "$THISHOST" == "$SESERVER" ]||[ "$THISHOST" == "&hostname;" ]; then echo "installing grid certs on $THISHOST" echo "searching certs in $DIRNAME" cp -p $DIRNAME/hostcert.pem /etc/grid-security/. cp -p $DIRNAME/hostkey.pem /etc/grid-security/. chown root:root /etc/grid-security/hostcert.pem chown root:root /etc/grid-security/hostkey.pem chmod 444 /etc/grid-security/hostcert.pem chmod 400 /etc/grid-security/hostkey.pem cp -p /etc/grid-security/hostcert.pem /etc/grid-security/bestman/bestmancert.pem cp -p /etc/grid-security/hostkey.pem /etc/grid-security/bestman/bestmankey.pem chown bestman:bestman /etc/grid-security/bestman/bestmancert.pem chown bestman:bestman /etc/grid-security/bestman/bestmankey.pem chmod 440 /etc/sudoers else echo "$THISHOST Wrong server to install " fi
touch /root/cert-install.log /root/install_cert_se.sh >> /root/cert-install.log 2>&1
